column3: ProphecyText
As he won't get along with {0}, Connor will break his wooden leg during a fight with her, but will only have the means to buy a new one of poor quality
A period of fatigue and demotivation will dramatically worsen Connor's performance at his job of {0}, so much so that he will be laid off by {1}
Connor will go buy {0} to give {1} a gift. Unfortunately on the way back, the package will fall {2}, damaging the gift beyond repair.
After Connor's {0} condition deteriorates, {1} will refuse to lend him money to help pay for the repairs.
Learning that Connor's side hustle of {0} will work well, {1} will pay people to post fake negative reviews online in order to degrade his image
Connor will have to help financially {0}, scammed by someone claiming to raise money for the renovation of the church {1}
Connor will have a car accident {0} on his way to work, making {1} furious and disappointed, as Connor's presence that day was crucial to her plans.
A sudden cold will make Connor sick, forcing him to cancel his vacation {0}. {1}, who was supposed to come with him, will be very disappointed with this last-minute cancellation.
Connor will sprain his ankle and therefore will not be able to drive over {0}. When asking {1} to take him there, she will retort being too short on time.
{0} will prank Connor using {1}, but having forgotten he constantly brings his {2} with him, the prank will go terribly wrong, sending him to the hospital.

{0} is not supposed to be dangerous, and yet Connor will suffer many injuries as a result of his work. He will discover that it is because his colleague {1} had decided to make his life a living hell.
{0} will have Connor move {1} for the job. In the city, he will regret not being able to practice {2} anymore.
Connor will be denied a raise at his job because {0} will receive it instead.
{0} will be hired at Connor's company, but although initially happy, he will realize that he can't bear spending so much time with her.
One day when Connor arrives at work, he will catch glimpse of some shady people. He will learn shortly afterwards that they are members of a sect deifying {0}, to which {1} belongs.
On a walk with {0} {1}, Conor will be disgusted to see her throw the packaging of her meal in the wild, trampling over his ecological ethics.
Connor will take {0} on a bucolic walk {1} but will quickly notice how bored she is. The rest of the date won't be any less awkward.

During a walk {0} Connor will be persuaded to be visited by the spirit of {1}. He will actually wake up in his room, realising that he should have checked the expiration date of the {2} he had for lunch.

Since they have been friends from a long time, Connor will try asking out {0} on {1}, but she will outright decline his feelings, leaving him devastated. He will try to drown in sorrow in {2}, only resulting in stomach ache.
At a {0} party, Connor will make an unsavory joke about {1}, deeply offending {2}
Connor will realize during a discussion with {0} that she has disturbing opinions about {1}, so much so he will reconsider the crush he had on her.
